node.title: Boat debris, esky message ends two-day stranding deep in croc territory
node.alt: A drone shot of the Daly River.
node.description: The two men lost their EPIRB and mobile phones after their boat sank in the remote Northern Territory. The men then spent two nights on an island without any food or fresh water before another vessel came across their debris.
node.content: ["Two men, who spent\u00a0two nights stranded on an island\u00a0after their boat sank in the remote Northern Territory, have\u00a0been rescued.", "NT Police said\u00a0the pair were making their way from the Daly River boat ramp\u00a0toward Anson Bay on Thursday when they hit a submerged object.", "Their boat\u00a0sank within seconds of impact, police said.", "Unable to trigger their EPIRB or retrieve their\u00a0phones before the boat sank,\u00a0the men\u00a0swam against the tide to a nearby island and wrote the word \"HELP\"\u00a0with a cooler lid, according to police.", "Police said the men then spent two nights waiting for help without food or fresh water.", "On Saturday, a boat passed by the area,\u00a0saw the debris, and the boat's skipper\u00a0found and rescued the stranded men, police said.", "The pair were\u00a0taken to Royal Darwin Hospital for assessment and discharged that evening, according to police.", "Acting Sergeant at\u00a0the\u00a0NT's Water Police Section, Troy Harris, hailed the skipper who rescued the men\u00a0who, he said, were lucky to get out of the ordeal alive.", "\"When they got into trouble, their safety equipment was not readily accessible in the short time they had before sinking.\" he said.", "\"They swam directly for the nearest land and made efforts to attract attention. Importantly, they stayed put.", "\"This incident highlights the need for a 'grab bag' with safety gear that is easily accessible, because the unexpected can happen, and it can happen in a matter of seconds.", "\"The men are very lucky to have survived this ordeal, given the remoteness of the area, the presence of saltwater crocodiles and the extreme heat at this time of year.", "\"We especially commend the skipper of the rescue vessel for saving these two men.\""]
